HomePage.title: Hello world!
HomePage.about_text: Since I was a kid, I loved creating and designing stuffs. Thats why I decided to attend to a Technical high school, where I learn several skills such as wood working, electronics, blacksmith, and a bit of programming. I studied Industrial Design at the university and I learn my most valuable soft skills like team working, leadership, active listening, etc.
HomePage.about_text2: During my student period, I had lots of teachers that inspired me and discovered the beauty of teaching. Now I have 11 years of teaching experience in asignments like History, Design, and programming.
HomePage.about_text3: Like many of us, I used my time during the pandemy to study programming. Nowaday I work as a full stack developer, with Next.js and Nest.js, mainly with Typescript, and learning AWS to broaden my horizons.

work.work_subtitle: Last updated on 2024/11/1. For the moment, Im listing my last 3 experience, this page is under construction yet.

edu.edu_subtitle: In this sections you will find all my studies and formation up to date.
